Package de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgdxmlParserHelper
    A collection of helper methods for the AgdmxLayer
    AndroidResolutions
    An util for different commonly used android aspect ratios
    DebugFormatter
    An utility class for formatting values (used for debugging)
    DebugFrequencyMeter
    An logger for the current fps / ups etc
    MenuRenderHelper
    Consists of static methods useful when rendering textures in the UI
    ShapeRendererUtil
    Additional methods for the shape renderer
    TextureHelper
    Consists of static methods useful when loading Textures
